headline.seo: ‘The Giant Mechanical Man’ Stars Jenna Fischer

docs.snippet: A lost soul unfit for even temporary work meets a street-corner mime and finds love in the romantic comedy “The Giant Mechanical Man.”...
docs.abstract: Jeannette Catsoulis reviews movie The Giant Mechanical Man, directed by Lee Kirk and starring Jenna Fischer.
docs.lead_paragraph: A lost soul unfit for even temporary work meets a street-corner mime and finds love in the romantic comedy “The Giant Mechanical Man.”

docs.snippet: The conviction of Charles Taylor, the former Liberian president, for war crimes in Sierra Leone’s civil war is a historic victory for justice and accountability....

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

docs.abstract: Editorial applauds conviction of former Liberian Pres Charles Taylor by the International Criminal Court for war crimes and crimes against humanity, notes conviction, first of a head of state by an international court since the Nuremberg trials, is a victory for justice and accountability; holds verdict serves as a warning to other would-be war criminals that justice will be served.
docs.lead_paragraph: The conviction of Charles Taylor, the former Liberian president, for war crimes in Sierra Leone’s civil war is a historic victory for justice and accountability.

headline.print_headline: Attorney General in Mexico Will Investigate Wal-Mart
headline.seo: Attorney General in Mexico to Investigate Wal-Mart
headline.main: Attorney General in Mexico Will Investigate Wal-Mart

docs.snippet: The announcement of the inquiry came as the country’s president, Felipe Calderón, said he was “very indignant” about bribery allegations surrounding the retailer....
docs.abstract: Mexican government steps up its response to the bribery allegations tied to Wal-Mart's growth in the country, announcing that the federal attorney general's office will begin an investigation into the company's actions.
docs.lead_paragraph: The announcement of the inquiry came as the country’s president, Felipe Calderón, said he was “very indignant” about bribery allegations surrounding the retailer.

headline.print_headline: Zynga Gains Millions of Users, and Its Revenue Jumps 32%

docs.snippet: The company reported a net loss of $85.4 million because of stock compensation expenses. It went public in December....
docs.abstract: Zynga reports a net loss in the first quarter, but adjusted earnings are better than Wall Street expectations and the company increased its number of monthly active users from 236 million to 292 million; Zynga says its net loss was $85.4 million, or 12 cents a share, in the most recent three months.
docs.lead_paragraph: The company reported a net loss of $85.4 million because of stock compensation expenses. It went public in December.
